title: Understanding the direction behind studio ghibli

body.raw:
# Why use Tailwind - use `npx create-next-app@latest` to generate a [nextjs](https://nextjs.org) app - open the folder in your code editor and run npm run dev ```html:index.html

Hello World

``` # Understanding package in Golang{" "} The concept of packages in [golang](http://go.dev) has been a big pain to me as a newbie but to my suprise its really easy ```go:main.go package main import("fmt"); func main (){ fmt.Println("Hello World") } ```
